name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Future Reference: Reinvest in Your Style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Future Reference Chrome extension is the easiest way to digitally archive your wardrobe as you shop, streamlining the way you manage and resell your clothing. 

Embrace the new era of fashion resale where convenience meets profitability.

How it works:
üõçÔ∏è Archive as you shop
With a simple click using our Chrome extension, you can effortlessly save all the details of the items you buy across thousands of sites. 

üí∞ Resale insights without the hassle
We do the heavy lifting to track prices and demand, so that you know when to sell and have all the original product information to reference. No more searching for those pesky details.

üÜì Free to use
Future reference is 100% free to use, and there is no pressure to sell.
